XERS The drug here is a glucogen in the form of a roomtemp stable liquid Novel medium for a basic drug The delivery device GPen is a selfadministered singledose injection of the liquid glucogen 99 of Phase 3 study participants successfully administered a full glucagon dose with the GPen compared to only 6 31 of those using standard glucagon kits Of course there is a risk FDA issues a CRL but compared to the risk for the average NDA this is a pretty good bet for approval
